quiz.question: What is the main idea of Dijkstra's algorithm?
options: Find the shortest path from a source node to all other nodes in a weighted graph
Find the longest path in a graph
quiz.answer: Find the shortest path from a source node to all other nodes in a weighted graph

hackerrank_problems.title: Shortest Reach 2
hackerrank_problems.description: Compute shortest distances from a given source node to all other nodes using Dijkstra’s algorithm.

hackerrank_problems.description: Apply Dijkstra’s algorithm for multiple queries and larger graphs.

hackerrank_problems.title: Roads and Libraries
